page.title: 10Games children play
page.content: Children in Swindon play a lot of games just like children all over the world. They play games in their gardens and roller-skate in the street.Children enjoy football and tennis.Cricket is played on the large school field and tick is played behind the P.E.shed. Netball,volleyball,skipping and hopscotch are played as well. The children in Swindon play in almost any safe place at all,playing fields, parks,open spaces and their own garden. Children enjoy volleyball where there is a high rope or net.Two teams have to throw the ball over the net and if the other team cannot return it they get a point.
